author: Patrick Buchanan
title: Call Me a Skeptic: We May Never Go Home Again
description: We are living through an inflection point in American history, one that may change who we are forever. The post Call Me a Skeptic: We May Never Go Home Again appeared first on The American Conservative.
content:
We are living through an inflection point in American history, one that may change who we are forever.“Depend upon it, sir, when a man knows he is to be hanged in a fortnight, it concentrates his mind wonderfully,” said Samuel Johnson.
And as it is with men,… [+4736 chars]
